Title: Allows a notice of dense breast tissue to be determination of medical necessity for coverage of a breast ultrasound
Summary: Allows a notice of dense breast tissue to be considered a determination of medical necessity for purposes of coverage of breast ultrasounds as recommended by a provider of mammography services.
LawCode: Amd ยง2404-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to allowing a notice of dense breast tissue to be considered a determination of medical necessity for coverage of a breast ultrasound
